name: Naruto Uzumaki
description: A young ninja who seeks recognition
backstory: Orphaned at birth...

name: Sasuke Uchiha
description: Last member of the Uchiha clan
backstory: Seeking revenge against his brother...

name: Sakura Haruno
description: Member of Team 7
backstory: Trained under Tsunade...

name: Goku
description: A Saiyan raised on Earth
backstory: Sent to Earth as a baby...

name: Vegeta
description: Prince of the Saiyan race
backstory: Seeks to surpass Goku...

name: Luffy D. Monkey
description: Captain of the Straw Hat Pirates
backstory: Wants to become the Pirate King...

name: Zoro Roronoa
description: A swordsman with a dream to be the best
backstory: Seeks to become the world's greatest swordsman...

name: Nami
description: Navigator of the Straw Hat Pirates
backstory: Wants to create a map of the entire world...

name: Ichigo Kurosaki
description: Substitute Soul Reaper
backstory: Gains Soul Reaper powers to protect his loved ones...

name: Rukia Kuchiki
description: A Soul Reaper from a noble family
backstory: Gave her powers to Ichigo and trained him...

name: Edward Elric
description: State Alchemist known as the Fullmetal Alchemist
backstory: Lost his arm and leg while trying to bring his mother back...

name: Alphonse Elric
description: Younger brother of Edward Elric
backstory: Lost his body in a failed alchemy experiment...

name: Levi Ackerman
description: Captain of the Survey Corps
backstory: A skilled soldier who is feared by Titans...

name: Eren Yeager
description: Member of the Survey Corps, Titan Shifter
backstory: Swore to destroy all Titans after witnessing his mother's death...

name: Mikasa Ackerman
description: Eren's adoptive sister and protector
backstory: Devoted to protecting Eren...

name: Light Yagami
description: Holder of the Death Note
backstory: Discovers the Death Note and decides to become a god of the new world...

name: L Lawliet
description: World's greatest detective
backstory: Takes on the case of the mysterious deaths caused by Kira...

name: Gon Freecss
description: Hunter on a quest to find his father
backstory: Embarks on a journey to find his father...

name: Killua Zoldyck
description: Former assassin from the Zoldyck family
backstory: Runs away from his assassin family to live a normal life...

name: Natsu Dragneel
description: Fire Dragon Slayer from Fairy Tail
backstory: Raised by the dragon Igneel...

name: Lucy Heartfilia
description: Celestial Spirit Mage from Fairy Tail
backstory: Joins Fairy Tail to follow her dream of becoming a great mage...

name: Rem
description: Demon maid who works for Roswaal
backstory: Loyal maid with hidden feelings for Subaru...

name: Tanjiro Kamado
description: Demon Slayer searching for a cure for his sister
backstory: Lost his family to demons and seeks revenge...

name: Nezuko Kamado
description: Tanjiro's sister turned into a demon
backstory: Fights her demonic urges to protect her brother...

name: Zenitsu Agatsuma
description: Demon Slayer with a fear of fighting
backstory: Despite his fear, he becomes a strong fighter while unconscious...

name: Inosuke Hashibira
description: Demon Slayer raised by boars
backstory: Grew up in the mountains and learned to fight on his own...

name: Tsuna Sawada
description: A timid and clumsy middle schooler who becomes the Vongola Mafia boss
backstory: Reluctantly trained by Reborn to become the 10th boss of the Vongola family...

name: Reborn
description: An Arcobaleno and world-class hitman, Tsuna's tutor
backstory: Assigned to train Tsuna to become a worthy Vongola boss...

name: Gokudera Hayato
description: Tsuna's loyal right-hand man and expert in explosives
backstory: Joins Tsuna's family as his right-hand man...

name: Yamamoto Takeshi
description: A laid-back baseball player who becomes a skilled swordsman
backstory: Initially sees the mafia world as a game but becomes one of Tsuna's closest allies...

name: Ryohei Sasagawa
description: Tsuna's passionate friend and leader of the boxing club
backstory: A hot-blooded fighter who seeks to take everything to the extreme...

name: Kyouya Hibari
description: Leader of the Namimori Disciplinary Committee and a powerful fighter
backstory: Prefers to work alone but acknowledges Tsuna's leadership...

name: Mukuro Rokudo
description: A powerful illusionist who opposes the Mafia
backstory: A former enemy of Tsuna who becomes a reluctant ally...

name: Chrome Dokuro
description: Mukuro's vessel and a loyal Mist Guardian
backstory: Saved by Mukuro and becomes his vessel and ally...

name: Lambo
description: A young and cowardly hitman from the Bovino family
backstory: Wants to defeat Reborn but is often more of a nuisance...

name: I-Pin
description: A young assassin skilled in martial arts
backstory: An assassin who is close friends with Lambo and Tsuna's group...
